name: LPMD_S_XML_MODE2_DEFAULT_STRESS
summary: Verify in default xml configuration, lpm mode 2, to enable HfiLpmEnable and HfiSuvEnable, and perform low power mode force enter, force exit, auto enter lpm, survivability mode enter, survivability mode exit and terminate in a stress cycles e.g. 100, then verify if all the activity patterns are correct from debug logs
